job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: <p><strong>Software Engineer (Full Stack) - Pareto Portfolio Company</strong></p><p><br></p><p><strong>What you’ll do</strong></p><ul><li>Full stack web/mobile application development with a variety of coding languages.</li><li>Work closely with Product Manager to define feature specifications and build products leveraging frameworks such as React &amp; React Native.</li><li>Create engaging UIs using performant and modern React.</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>Required skills</strong></p><ul><li>Bachelors in computer science or equivalent.</li><li>You produce readable, high quality code.</li><li>Highly technical with strong hands-on coding skills.</li><li>Fluent in at least one backend web framework.</li><li>Experience with React or a similar framework.</li><li>Comfortable with SQL.</li><li>You prize reliability, simplicity, and robustness in building out systems.</li><li>You communicate clearly and listen well.</li><li>You are a self-starter and comfortable taking on a variety of roles.</li><li>Have a startup mentality: team player, self-motivated, high-integrity, pragmatic, resourceful, can execute under pressure.</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>Preferred Qualifications</strong></p><ul><li>Masters in computer science or equivalent.</li><li>Prior knowledge of Graphql, Redis, Elasticsearch and React Native.</li><li>Prior experience with distributed systems and high-throughput services.</li><li>Knowledge of AWS or similar cloud services.</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>Location</strong></p><ul><li>San Francisco&nbsp;</li></ul><p><br></p>
